name: ablgrp

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ Abel, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ CMnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Abel → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Abel ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ CMnd))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Abel → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Abel ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ CMnd))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn)))

comment: An Abelian group is a group. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-2011.)
